snippet: A plan to move more than 600 tons of precursor chemicals out of Syria in vehicles is raising concerns that such a convoy would present a slow-moving target for Syrian opposition groups.
abstract: Plan to move more than 600 tons of chemical weapons out of Syria in vehicles is raising concerns that convoy could present slow-moving target for Syrian opposition groups.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER, THOM SHANKER and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: A plan to move more than 600 tons of precursor chemicals out of Syria in vehicles is raising concerns that such a convoy would present a slow-moving target for Syrian opposition groups.

headline.main: West Faces Challenge in Moving Syrian Chemical Arms Through Battlefields
headline.print_headline: West Faces Challenge in Moving Syrian Chemical Arms Through Battlefields
